value:
I have gained a new power over
dreams. Why is it humans still think
it appropriate to leer at me? Ugh...

Lady Freyja was the first to show
me love. She showed me undying
love could exist—if only in dreams.

What use is reality? With the dream
realm, I can know I am loved. Can the
real world offer the same joy?

Eitr, fragile as she is, surely wishes
there were someone to love her...

There are disgusting humans in all
directions across these vast lands...
Ugh! They make me sick!

I am Plumeria, the lewd dream...
I hope this is to your satisfaction.
Such ecstasy...

I am one of the dökkálfar, not some
petal-soft ljósálfr.

Am I to make this up to
you somehow?

And what is it you intend for me
to do with this?

I am Plumeria, dökkálfr of lewd
dreams. My dream, though, is one
day seeing Lady Freyja reawaken.

Eitr is weak—always crying, fearing
she'll be abandoned.$k$pShe reminds me of how I was
when I was human.$k$pI had that same yearning to be loved,
to be needed by someone else...$k$pYou wouldn't understand, surely.$k$pY-you know the feeling too?
I...I see.
What filth.
Avert your eyes.
Avert your eyes.
Beg.
In Lady Freyja's name.
In Lady Freyja's name.
Wretched...
Understand this: my power is meant for the benefit of Lady Freyja alone.
Ugh! Have you no manners?! ...Beast.
This change has put new eyes on me... That, I do not find pleasant.
The ecstasy of the dream nectar will never fade from my memory...
Should Lady Freyja wish it, I would endure any torture.
When I look at Eitr, I see...only the weak child I once was.
You may command me, but...I find no cause for despair in that.
Yes.
Which way?
I will not stop.
